titleInfo.title: Nine Inch Nails at Gaylord Entertainment Center

mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and brown on brown) announcing Nine Inch Nails and Queens of the Stone Age at Gaylord Entertainment Center on October 31. Poster features woodcuts of bats and skulls.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
